snippet: Skratch TV, a joint venture between the PGA Tour and the digital company Bedrocket, will focus on golfers’ personalities and lifestyles and tell stories in shareable ways.
abstract: PGA Tour announces joint venture with digital entertainment company Bedrocket to produce an online network called Skratch TV; hopes new digital push will help sport reach millenial fans.
lead_paragraph: Skratch TV, a joint venture between the PGA Tour and the digital company Bedrocket, will focus on golfers’ personalities and lifestyles and tell stories in shareable ways.

headline.main: To Lure Younger Fans, PGA Tour Will Offer a TV Network Online
headline.print_headline: To Lure Younger Fans, PGA Tries Digital Push
